tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE movies (
  movie_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  release_date DATE,
  genre VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE actors (
  actor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  birth_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE directors (
  director_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  birth_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE movie_directors (
  movie_id INT,
  director_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movies(movie_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (director_id) REFERENCES directors(director_id)
)

CREATE TABLE movie_titles(id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  release_date DATE NOT NULL,
  genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE movie_directors(id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  director_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  movie_id UUID REFERENCES movie_titles(id)
)

CREATE TABLE movie_actors(id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  actor_name VARCHAR(255),
  movie_id UUID REFERENCES movie_titles(id)
)

CREATE TABLE movie_reviews(id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating FLOAT,
  movie_id UUID REFERENCES movie_titles(id)
)
